toydi dreamed:

> In this *utopia*, all kinds of today's killer web apps (i.e. forum,
> wiki, cms, portals, weblog etc) have adopted ReST and started to form a
> wonderful scene: they are able to integrate each others functionality,
> exchanging information among themselves seamlessly and even happily
> inviting desktop & mobile apps to join in their big family.

I'ld like to have some of what you took before going to sleep!  Nice trip!
